page_type.back: Back to add and edit pages
page_type.title: What type of page do you want to add?
page_type.question_page_hint: A page that asks users for information
page_type.guidance_page_hint: A page that provides users with information

information_type.back: Back to add and edit pages
information_type.title: What information do you need from users?
information_type.hint: You can ask for more information later

written.title: Written answer
written.hint: A short or long answer as text or number

types.title: Type of written answer
types.long: Long answer (more than a single line)

date.title: Date
date.hint: A day, month and year or month and year only

address.title: UK address
address.hint: A street address, town or city and postcode

phone.title: Phone number
phone.hint: A UK phone number, for example, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192

file.title: Supporting evidence
file.hint: A document, for example, DOC, PDF, CSV, Excel

email.title: Email address
email.hint: An email address, for example, name@example.com

list.title: A list of options that users can choose from

yes_no.title: Yes or No
yes_no.hint: Allow users to answer either 'Yes' or 'No'

checkboxes.title: Checkboxes
checkboxes.hint: A list for users to select multiple answers

radios.title: Radios
radios.hint: A list for users to select one answer

select.title: Autocomplete
select.hint: A list of options revealed to users as they type

delete.title: Delete this page
delete.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this page?

delete_page_h1: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
delete_page_h1_dynamic: Are you sure you want to delete [page heading]?
delete_question_h1: Are you sure you want to delete this question?
info_types_title: What information do you need from users?
info_types_hint: You can ask for more information later
info_type_1_hint: A short or long answer as text or number
info_type_1b: Long answer (more than a single line)
info_type_2_hint: A day, month and year or month and year only
info_type_4_hint: A UK phone number, for example, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
info_type_5_hint: A document, for example, DOC, PDF, CSV, Excel
info_type_6_hint: An email address, for example, name@example.com
list_option: A list of options users can choose from
list_type_1_hint: Allow users to answer either ‘Yes’ or ‘No’
list_type_2_hint: A list for users to select multiple answers
list_type_3_hint: A list for users to select one answer
autocomplete: A list of options revealed to users as they type
question: Question
short_description_hint: Enter a short description for this question like 'licence period'.
min_character_hint: The minimum number of characters users can enter
max_character_hint: The maximum number of characters users can enter
regex_hint: Specifies a regular expression to validate users’ inputs.
classes_hint: Apply CSS classes to this field.
max_words_hint: Specifies the maximum number of words users can enter
rows_hint: Specifies the number of textarea rows (default is 5 rows)
precision_hint: Specifies the number of decimal places users can enter.
max_days_hint: Determines the earliest date users can enter
min_days_hint: Determines the latest date users can enter
min_file_hint: The minimum number of files users can upload
max_file_hint: The maximum number of files users can upload
file_types_title: Select the file types you accept
